official_title: A bill to designate Great Kills Park in the Gateway National Recreation Area as "World War II Veterans Park at Great Kills".

summary.text: Redesignates the Staten Island Unit of Great Kills Park in the Gateway National Recreation Area as World War II Veterans Park at Great Kills.
